translation.en: Yeah, there's been a bad car accident.
translation.zh: ‎是 发生了很严重的车祸

translation.en: We're about two miles off the freeway.
She's got a punctured lung. Get her into Operating Room B.
translation.zh: ‎她肺部穿孔 把她送进手术室B

‎-什么情况？
‎-女性 无身份证明

translation.en: Appears to be in her late 20s, car accident.
I'll love you forever and a day.
translation.zh: ‎我会爱你 比永远多一天

translation.en: She's going into v-tach. She's unstable.
translation.zh: ‎她心动过速 情况不稳定

translation.en: Tell B to have a crash cart ready.

translation.zh:
‎她心动过缓 脉搏30次/分钟
‎血压90/50

translation.en: Excuse me. I'm looking for my wife.
translation.zh: ‎嗨 不好意思 我在找我老婆

translation.en: I'm Russell Williams. I got a call.
translation.zh: ‎我是罗素·威廉斯 我接到了电话

translation.en: My wife Jennifer was in a car accident.
She's in the OR, sir. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: ‎她在手术室里 先生 对不起

translation.en: No, you can't go in there! Mr. Williams!
translation.zh: ‎不 你不能进去！ ‎威廉斯先生！

translation.en: Nice work, everyone. Let's prep for surgery.
translation.zh: ‎做得好 大家 请做术前准备

translation.en: I'm sorry, you can't be here.
I was wondering if there's an update.
Okay, did she say anything to anyone about what happened?
translation.zh:
‎好 但她向任何人说了
‎发生了什么事吗？

translation.en: has had a lot of internal bleeding on her brain...
It's possible she won't remember anything.
If anything changes, I'll let you know.
translation.zh: ‎好吗？但有任何更新 我会让你知道

translation.en: your wife's out of surgery. She hasn't regained consciousness yet,
translation.zh: ‎你老婆做完手术了 ‎她还未苏醒过来

translation.en: but if you want, I'll take you up to Recovery to see her.
translation.zh:
‎但你想要的话
‎我能带你上恢复室看她

translation.en: I want you to know that I'm here
and I'm not gonna leave, no matter what. Okay?
translation.zh: ‎不管怎样我都不会离开 好吗？

translation.en: They grow up so fast, don't they?
-You gotta enjoy it while it lasts. -Mm.
Oh, excuse me for a second.
I can be there in - what? - 45.
I'll take the bear as well.
Look, he's getting a big bear.
So they said they found Jennifer at a rest stop?
translation.zh: ‎他们说在休息站找到珍妮弗吗？
‎33号公路 布鲁贝克峡谷附近

translation.en: When was the last time you saw her?
translation.zh: ‎你最后一次见到她是什么时候？

translation.en: That night, she went out to get groceries, said she wanted to cook dinner.
translation.zh: ‎那天晚上她出去买杂货 说想弄晚餐

translation.en: No, I waited about an hour, and...
translation.zh: ‎没 我等了大约一小时 然后…

translation.en: I tried to call her cell phone. She didn't answer,
translation.zh: ‎我尝试打她的手机 她没接

translation.en: and then I called the store,
they said they hadn't seen her.
Have you been having problems at home, you and Jennifer?
translation.zh: ‎你们之间有什么问题吗？ ‎你和珍妮弗？

translation.en: I'm trying to piece together what your wife was doing
translation.zh: ‎我想弄清楚你老婆没带身份证

translation.en: at a rest area with no ID.
Alone, in the middle of the night.
And I'd love to know the same thing.
But we had just gotten married,
translation.zh: ‎但是 探长 我们刚结婚

translation.en: we had just moved to the mountains.
When your wife went to the store, did she take her car?
translation.zh: ‎你老婆去杂货店时 开了她的车吗？

translation.en: I'll start with a report on the car and see what happens.
translation.zh: ‎我先从汽车报告下手 再看看怎样

translation.en: I would love to talk to your wife when she's able.
translation.zh: ‎你老婆情况允许时 我想和她谈谈

translation.en: I hope she gets better soon.

translation.zh: ‎谢谢你 长官 感谢你的时间

translation.en: Female, African-American, ten years of age.
translation.zh: ‎女性 非裔美国人 十岁

translation.en: You're a cop. Why can't you find your own daughter?
translation.zh:
‎你是个警察
‎为什么连自己女儿都找不到？

translation.en: Police have no leads on the disappearance of ten-year old Hannah Page.
translation.zh: ‎警方目前对十岁汉娜·佩奇的失踪 ‎未有任何线索

translation.en: We'll continue to run extensive CTs,
translation.zh: ‎我们会继续做全面的断层扫描

translation.en: but you should know, the damage to your wife's hippocampus was severe.
translation.zh:
‎但你需知道
‎你老婆的海马体损伤相当严重

translation.en: And what does that mean exactly?
While she'll retain a great deal of her semantic memory -
translation.zh: ‎她会保留着大量的语义记忆

translation.en: episodic recall is far less reliable.
translation.zh: ‎但情节记忆的可靠程度或远低于此

translation.en: But she'll know who I am, right?
translation.zh: ‎但她会知道我是谁 对吧？

translation.en: We'll do everything to aid her--
Are you saying my wife doesn't remember me?

translation.zh:
‎-有这个可能
‎-不 别给我“可能”

translation.en: Does my wife know who I am or not?
translation.zh: ‎我老婆是知道还是不知道我是谁？

translation.en: We're going to get her there, I promise you.
translation.zh: ‎我们会让她好起来的 我答应你

translation.en: Your husband's here to see you.
-I'll be down the hall if you need me. -Thanks.
translation.zh: ‎如果你想要些什么 我就在大厅 ‎谢谢你 医生

translation.en: pretty overwhelmed. I'll just sit right over here, okay?
translation.zh: ‎很不知所措 我就坐在那里 好吗？

translation.en: Really hard. Remember any of that?
translation.zh: ‎很严重地撞伤 你记得吗？

translation.en: Jennifer, do you know who I am?
translation.zh: ‎珍妮弗 你知道我是谁吗？

translation.en: You don't remember me, do you?
Look, the doctor said that there are going to be...
some things that are harder to remember than others.
I'm going to be right here with you, I promise.
translation.zh: ‎我会在这里陪着你 我答应

translation.en: I don't even know your name.
It's really nice to meet you.
Look, I already told the other guy--
I don't care about them. You're talking to me now.
translation.zh: ‎那不关我的事 你现在和我说话

translation.en: I don't know. It was dark, it was raining.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 当时很暗 在下着雨

translation.en: I just wanted to get home.
I didn't see her until it was too late.
translation.zh: ‎我没看到她 直到为时已晚

translation.en: That's not why I brought you in.
I wanna know if you saw anyone else there.
translation.zh: ‎我想知道你是否在那里看到其他人

translation.en: How about other cars in the parking lot? Did you see any?
translation.zh: ‎那停车场里是否有其它车子？ ‎你看到了吗？

translation.en: Now you mention it, there was...
translation.zh: ‎经你这样一提 那里是有一辆…

translation.en: I think it was pulling a car.
translation.zh: ‎对 它好像是在拉着一辆车

translation.en: Yeah, with a hauling winch, a cable.
translation.zh: ‎对 就用个绞盘 用钢索

translation.en: I remember thinking it was kinda strange.
Did you see where the truck went?
It was already gone when the ambulance arrived.
translation.zh: ‎救护车抵达时 它已经不在了

translation.en: He didn't say anything about a pickup truck before.
translation.zh: ‎他之前没提起过皮卡车的事

translation.en: The brain trust in Traffic didn't ask.
translation.zh: ‎那是因为交通部的天才们没问

translation.en: She either drove herself there, someone stole her car,
translation.zh:
‎她要么是自己开车到那里
‎然后车被偷走

translation.en: or she was dropped off. Either way, someone else was there.
translation.zh: ‎要么是被载到那里 ‎不管怎样 当时有其他人在场

translation.en: -I know what week this is, Frank. -Don't.
translation.zh:
‎-我知道这是什么星期 弗兰克
‎-别

translation.en: Whatever you do won't make up for what happened.
translation.zh:
‎无论你做什么
‎都无法弥补发生了的事

translation.en: Scratches and bruises on her wrists. They were defensive wounds.
translation.zh: ‎她手腕上的抓痕和淤青 ‎都是自卫性伤痕

translation.en: It also said they could've been caused in the collision.
translation.zh: ‎也说了有可能是碰撞中造成的

translation.en: I'll see if the drivers saw this truck.
translation.zh:
‎我要把司机们带回来
‎看他们是否见过这卡车

translation.en: Look at you. When's the last time you took a day off?
translation.zh: ‎看看你 你最后一次拿假是几时？

translation.en: I'm not a beach kind of guy.
One of the accident witnesses is waiting for you upfront.
translation.zh: ‎有位车祸目击者在前面等你

translation.en: Thanks, Charlie. Can you bring him back?
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你 查理 能把他带过来吗？

translation.en: Sorry, Sean. You're not getting rid of me that easily.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 肖恩 ‎你想摆脱我没那么容易

translation.en: If you're gonna run with this, make sure it's for the right reason.
translation.zh: ‎你若坚持要这么做 ‎确保是为了正确的理由 弗兰克

translation.en: Mr. Kahn, thanks for coming in.
And eventually, I worked up the nerve to ask you out.
translation.zh: ‎最后我鼓起了勇气约你出去

translation.en: You wanted to go to one of those Japanese places
translation.zh: ‎而你想去其中一家日本餐厅

translation.en: where they cook in front of you, they do the knife tricks.
translation.zh: ‎那种会在你面前烹煮的 会耍刀的

translation.en: and I was so worried about impressing you
that I neglected to tell you
They cook everything on that griddle.
'cause I blew up like a blimp.
I forgot to ask. Have you talked to my parents?
translation.zh:
‎嘿 我忘了问
‎你跟我父母说过话了吗？

translation.en: They must be worried. They haven't heard from me.
translation.zh: ‎他们没收到我的消息 一定很担心

translation.en: Yeah, there was a fire, and...
translation.zh: ‎对 发生了一场火灾 而…

translation.en: -Sorry. -If you don't mind, I need a moment alone.
translation.zh: ‎对不起 ‎如果你不介意 我想一个人静一静

translation.en: Yeah, of course. I'll just be right outside here.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 当然 我会在外面

translation.en: I'm here about the young woman that was in that accident two nights ago,
translation.zh: ‎我来探望几天前 ‎出车祸的那位年轻女子

translation.en: Miss Williams is only seeing family members at the moment.
At least see that Miss Williams gets these.
translation.zh: ‎至少确保威廉斯小姐收到这些

translation.en: I want you to keep up your memory games.
translation.zh: ‎我要你继续玩你的记忆游戏

translation.en: They're just as important as your physical rehab.
translation.zh: ‎它们和你的康复训练一样重要

translation.en: Your CT came back, from yesterday.
translation.zh: ‎你昨天断层扫描的结果回来了

translation.en: It's not going to happen overnight.
I wanna make sure that you're--
I won't overdo it. I promise.
I'm sending you home with a cane, too. I want you to use it to walk.
translation.zh: ‎我也要你带着拐杖回去 ‎我要你用它来走路

‎-一天两到三分钟 好吗？
‎-好

translation.en: Hey... as the memory comes back,
it's normal for wires to get crossed.
-I just need a little help, actually. -One, two, three...
translation.zh:
‎-我需要点帮助
‎-一 二 三…

translation.en: Hey, it's gonna be okay, alright?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 一切会好起来的 好吗？

translation.en: It's been in the family a while.
We moved in right before the wedding.
Go ahead. Feel free. Go check it out.
And this is the best part about living out here.
translation.zh: ‎在这里生活最棒的就是这个

translation.en: Oh... I wish you could remember our wedding night.
translation.zh: ‎我真希望你能记得我们的新婚之夜

translation.en: We never even left this room.
Wait till you see the backyard.
I still can't believe this is really our house.
translation.zh: ‎我还是无法相信这真的是我们的房子

translation.en: it's been in the family for a while.
I mean, it's been fixed up and added onto over the years, but...
translation.zh: ‎它多年来已经过修复与扩建 但是…

translation.en: Nearest neighbor is over a mile away.
Now, if you grab a bottle of wine,
sit in these chairs right over here, you can catch one hell of a sunset.
translation.zh: ‎坐在这些椅子上 ‎你能欣赏超棒的日落

translation.en: So I was thinking I'll probably start you out
in the guest bedroom down here.
-It's closer to the kitchen-- -No special treatment.
translation.zh: ‎它比较靠近厨房… ‎我不要任何特别待遇

translation.en: I got it, but I just don't want you to overdo it.
translation.zh: ‎我明白 但我不想你过劳

translation.en: I need us to get back to our old routine.
translation.zh: ‎我需要我们回到原来的日常生活

‎-你还好吧？
‎-嗯 好 谢谢你

translation.en: -I'll go get the rest of your stuff. -Thanks.
translation.zh:
‎-我去把你的东西拿过来
‎-谢谢你

translation.en: Could you just hold on for one second?
I'll step out, see if I can get a better signal.
translation.zh: ‎让我走出去 看看信号会不会好点

translation.en: How's it going? Any luck finding the car?
but I've talked to a couple of drivers
translation.zh: ‎但我和几位停下来帮你老婆

translation.en: who stopped to help your wife.
Well, two of them thought they saw a white pickup truck
translation.zh: ‎其中两位认为他们看见 ‎一辆白色皮卡车离开车祸现场

translation.en: leave the scene of the accident.
translation.zh: ‎一辆白色皮卡车离开车祸现场

translation.en: One of them thought that it might've been pulling your wife's car.
translation.zh: ‎其中一位认为它或许拉着你老婆的车

translation.en: Well, the other thinks that he saw the plates.

translation.zh: ‎从他的老式凯迪拉克敞篷车内

translation.en: But in the meantime, I'd really love it
translation.zh: ‎但在此期间 我真的很希望

translation.en: if your wife could come down to the station tomorrow.
translation.zh: ‎你老婆明天能下来警局一趟

translation.en: Look, we literally just got home,
translation.zh: ‎听我说 我们才刚回到家

translation.en: and the last thing I want to do is overwhelm her.
translation.zh: ‎而我最不想做的事就是让她激动

translation.en: Mr. Williams, we promise to take it easy on her.
translation.zh:
‎威廉斯先生
‎我们答应不会逼得她太紧

translation.en: Yeah, 11:00 is great. Let's do that.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 很好 就十一点吧

translation.en: I overheard you outside on the phone.
translation.zh: ‎我无意中听到你在外面讲电话

translation.en: Oh, yeah. That was work calling.
translation.zh: ‎噢 对 那是工作打来的

translation.en: Wondering when I was coming back.
translation.zh: ‎他们想知道我什么时候回去

translation.en: I told them we just got home,
translation.zh: ‎我告诉他们我们才刚回到家

translation.en: and there's no way I'll rush your recovery.
translation.zh: ‎而你的康复我绝不会草草了事

translation.en: Are they okay with me taking time off?
Honey, actually, you quit your job
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 其实我们搬进来时

translation.en: We'd decided we wanted to start a family
and this was the best way to do it,
came out here for the fresh air,
What about friends? I must have friends.
Since the move, we don't see them as much as we used to.
translation.zh:
‎但自然地 搬家以后
‎我们就没像往常那样常见面了

translation.en: I spoke to Nancy when we were leaving the hospital.
translation.zh:
‎实际上 我们离开医院时
‎我和南希说过话

translation.en: I asked if she'd let everybody know.
She and Jason will visit once they get back from Hawaii.
translation.zh:
‎她说她和杰森一旦从夏威夷回来
‎就会过来拜访

translation.en: Oh. Maybe I should reach out to them, too.
translation.zh: ‎或许我也应该主动联络他们

translation.en: It might bring back some memories.
Have the police found my phone?
Next time I'm out, I'll just pick you up a new one.
translation.zh: ‎我下次外出时给你买个新的
‎我们以前是开心的 对吧？
‎亲爱的 我们依然是开心的

translation.en: Why were you asking about Jennifer Williams?
translation.zh: ‎你干嘛打听珍妮弗·威廉斯的事？

translation.en: Russell, there's someone in the backyard!
I think I'm gonna head into town today, grab a few things.
translation.zh: ‎我今天打算到城里去 ‎去买点东西

translation.en: I feel like I need to take a look around.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得我只是需要四处看看

translation.en: Maybe something will trigger my memory.
translation.zh:
‎谁知道？也许某些东西
‎会触发我的记忆

translation.en: I told you it'd all come back.
Charlie. How many white pickup trucks do you think there are in the county?
translation.zh: ‎查理 ‎你觉得县内有多少辆白色皮卡车？

translation.en: Is anyone waiting upfront for me?
Actually, I think I've been stood up.
translation.zh: ‎其实 我想我是被放鸽子了

translation.en: Hey, it's Russell. I can't come to the phone right now.
translation.zh:
‎嘿 这是罗素
‎我现在无法接听你的电话

translation.en: Leave a message, I'll call back.
Run a trace on this number. I'm going out.
translation.zh: ‎追查这号码 我出去一趟

translation.en: I ran a search on our database for Russell Williams,
translation.zh: ‎我在数据库里搜索罗素·威廉斯

translation.en: Do you mind searching for the contact info he gave you?
translation.zh: ‎你能搜索一下他给你的联系资料吗？

translation.en: This is the address that he gave us.
translation.zh: ‎好 这是他给我们的地址

translation.en: Er, will you do me a favor?
When you speak to her, please have her call
translation.zh: ‎当你和她说话时 请你让她打来

translation.en: Every time I've called it's gone straight to voicemail.
translation.zh: ‎我每次打去都直接转入语音信箱

translation.en: Did Miss Williams ever mention a white pickup truck?
translation.zh:
‎威廉斯小姐曾提到过
‎一辆白色皮卡车吗？

‎-怎么了？
‎-没什么 只是好奇

translation.en: I'll love you forever and a day.
translation.zh: ‎我会爱你 比永远多一天

translation.en: Look at you, made it down the steps.
I was just exploring. Seeing if anything felt familiar.
translation.zh: ‎我只是在探索 看看有什么感觉熟悉

translation.en: I had them set that up for you.
While you were wandering, anything come back to you?
translation.zh: ‎你四处看看时 有想起了什么吗？

translation.en: -I'd like to talk to Jennifer Williams. -Who?
translation.zh: ‎我想和珍妮弗·威廉斯说说话 ‎谁？

translation.en: I was told she lived here with her husband Russell.
translation.zh: ‎我被告知她和她老公罗素住在这里

translation.en: Someone gave you the wrong information.
translation.zh: ‎那很抱歉 你收到错误的消息了

translation.en: It's just me and my husband.
And you've never heard of a Russell or Jennifer Williams?
translation.zh:
‎而你从未听说过
‎任何罗素或珍妮弗威廉斯？

translation.en: Looks like Russell Williams gave the hospital the wrong address.
translation.zh:
‎看来罗素·威廉斯给了医院
‎错误的地址

translation.en: Maybe he just made a mistake on the forms.
translation.zh: ‎可能他只是填表格时弄错了

translation.en: Did anyone actually run the victim's prints?
translation.zh: ‎有人对受害者进行指纹核对了吗？

translation.en: How did they find him to let him know she was hurt?
translation.zh:
‎他们是怎样联络到他
‎让他知道她受伤了？

translation.en: That's the thing. I asked, but... nobody remembered calling anyone.
translation.zh: ‎这就是问题所在 我问了 但… ‎没人记得曾打给任何人

translation.en: I don't suppose you got a trace on the number I gave you?
translation.zh: ‎我想我给你的号码也查不出什么吧？

translation.en: We tried to trace it using GPS, but there's no signal.
translation.zh: ‎我们试过用卫星定位追踪 但没信号

translation.en: Nurse Masters said, as memories come back,
translation.zh: ‎马斯特斯护士说随着记忆的恢复
‎但你在康复 那是好消息

translation.en: All the memories are gonna come back.
We've got every day from now, the rest of our lives to make new ones.
translation.zh:
‎而且从现在开始
‎我们有余生的每一天来创造新的

translation.en: Look, maybe I just need more time.
Oh for God's sake, Jen. I am your husband.
translation.zh: ‎噢 天啊 珍 我是你老公

translation.en: I sat in that damn waiting room
night after night, because I couldn't stand not being there when you woke up.
translation.zh: ‎一夜又一夜 因为我无法忍受 ‎你醒来时看不见我在身旁

translation.en: I was there at every step of your recovery and this is what I get?
translation.zh: ‎你康复的每一步我全程作陪 ‎而这就是我得到的？

translation.en: -A wife who won't let me touch her? -You're hurting me.
translation.zh: ‎一个不让我碰她的老婆？ ‎你弄疼我了
‎马斯特斯护士 这是佩奇探长

translation.en: can you pull up your surveillance cameras from your parking lot
translation.zh:
‎你是否能把医院停车场的
‎监控录像调出来？
‎能 没问题 让我问问保安
‎你介意告诉我你在找什么吗？

translation.en: White pickup truck with a winch.
Got those real estate records you asked for.
That house has belonged to Clark and Ruth Gibson since 1976.
translation.zh:
‎自1976年以来 那房子一直属于
‎克拉克和露丝·吉布森

translation.en: -I'll tell her you say hi. -Please do.
Security just pulled the video file.
They'll email it over to you.
translation.zh: ‎他们会通过电子邮件发给你

translation.en: If you need anything else, let me know.
translation.zh: ‎如果还有什么需要 请尽管告诉我

translation.en: how did Russell prove he was her husband?
translation.zh: ‎那罗素怎样证明自己是她老公？

translation.en: It says here in the doctor's notes
that he showed some family photos and identified a back tattoo.
translation.zh:
‎他展示了一些家庭照片
‎并认出了一个背部纹身

translation.en: -Thank you for all your help. -Sorry, Detective.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你的帮忙 ‎对不起 探长

translation.en: Thanks so much. Have a good night.
You always used to have a bunch of these around the office, so we...
translation.zh:
‎你以前总是在办公室里摆着这些
‎所以我们…

translation.en: actually planted a special plot out there for you.
translation.zh: ‎还在外面那块地上给你种了一些

translation.en: What I said last night was not fair.
translation.zh: ‎我昨晚所说的话对你太不公平了

translation.en: And it just... It got away from me.
If you want to take it slow, we will take it slow, absolutely.
translation.zh:
‎如果你想慢慢来
‎那我们就慢慢来 没问题

translation.en: I want you to be comfortable.
-What can I do for you? -Whoa, man. Did that hurt?
translation.zh: ‎我能为你做些什么？ ‎哇 老兄 那疼吗？

translation.en: Why? You looking to get some silver? Maybe one of these conches?
translation.zh:
‎干嘛？你想穿孔吗？
‎不如来个耳蜗钉？

translation.en: -Yeah. You do them? -I can do anything you want.
translation.zh: ‎是 你做不？ ‎你要我做什么都行

translation.en: Can you tell me what that means?
translation.zh: ‎你能告诉我那是什么意思吗？

translation.en: I got a hit on Jennifer's maiden name.
She shared a house with her parents down in San Jose.
translation.zh:
‎她之前在圣何塞和她父母
‎同住一所房子

translation.en: I'm on my way there now.
No, not really. I was gonna ask you the same thing.
translation.zh: ‎没有 我正想问你同样的问题

translation.en: How about we do a romantic dinner tonight?
translation.zh: ‎不如我们今晚来个浪漫晚餐？

‎-你说你最爱什么菜来着？
‎-意大利

translation.en: Do you mind going out and grabbing some groceries?
Not at all. I'd be happy to.
Yeah. Do you want white or red?
-Better get red if it's Italian. -Red it is.
translation.zh:
‎-意大利菜应该配红酒
‎-那就红吧

translation.en: They left the company before the wedding.
That was about two months ago.
They were the big office couple.
HR usually frowns on that kind of thing,
translation.zh: ‎人力资源部通常不赞成这种事

translation.en: but they were cute together. What you gonna do?
translation.zh: ‎但他们真的很登对 你能怎样？

translation.en: Those are from the corporate retreat last year.
That's the happy couple right there.

translation.zh: ‎如果那是罗素 那位是谁？

translation.en: What's this all about anyway? Are they in some kind of trouble?
translation.zh: ‎这究竟是怎么回事？ ‎他们遇到什么麻烦了吗？

translation.en: Not for the last couple of months.
He and his supervisor had a little disagreement.
translation.zh: ‎他和他的主管起了点小争执

translation.en: Broke his nose in three places.
Ryan's a smart guy, but he's got a hell of a temper.
translation.zh: ‎那家伙很聪明 但脾气有够臭

translation.en: I'm gonna need all the contact info you can give me.
translation.zh: ‎我需要你能给我的所有联系资料

translation.en: after they left, I found a little note
translation.zh: ‎他们离开之后 我在珍妮弗桌上

translation.en: that Russell wrote to Jennifer, buried in her desk.
translation.zh: ‎找到一张罗素写给她的小纸条

translation.en: It's yours if you think it might help.
translation.zh: ‎如果你认为会有帮助 那就归你

translation.en: I'll love you forever and a day.
translation.zh: ‎我会爱你 比永远多一天

translation.en: How can we have no Internet?
You took a hell of a fall.
Oh, sweetheart, that doesn't look good at all.
translation.zh: ‎噢 宝贝 那看起来很严重

translation.en: What did you think was gonna happen?
Roaming around in the yard in your condition?
translation.zh: ‎你这个情况还在院子里乱走？

translation.en: -What were you doing out there? -What's going on?
translation.zh:
‎-等等…
‎-你在外面做什么？ ‎这是怎么回事？

translation.en: Wait. What did you do to my phone?
translation.zh: ‎等等 你对我手机做了什么？

translation.en: -I don't want to rest! -You need to. It'll be good for you.
translation.zh:
‎-休息一会儿
‎-我不要休息！ ‎你需要休息 那对你有好处

translation.en: Okay. Now give that about 20 minutes,
and I promise you, you won't feel any more pain, okay?
translation.zh: ‎你就不会觉得痛了 我答应你 好吗？

translation.en: -What do you mean? -What did you do with my husband?
translation.zh:
‎-你什么意思？
‎-你对我老公做了什么？

translation.en: After everything that I have done for you,
translation.zh: ‎在我为你付出了那么多之后

translation.en: you'd give me a little more gratitude.
Just stay right here. I'm gonna get some work done.
translation.zh: ‎你乖乖待在这里 我要去办点事

translation.en: Everything's gonna be fine, I promise.
translation.zh: ‎一切会没事的 我答应你

translation.en: I've tried to call you to start physical therapy.
translation.zh:
‎我一直在尝试联系你
‎以便能开始物理治疗

translation.en: Jennifer and I were saying how we hadn't heard from you.
translation.zh:
‎我和珍妮弗今早才在聊
‎怎么没收到你的电话

translation.en: Frankly, I've been concerned as well. None of the numbers that you gave us work.
translation.zh: ‎而且老实说 我也很担心 ‎你给我们的号码没一个能用

translation.en: No, I probably got a number crossed somewhere.
translation.zh: ‎我可能是给错电话号码了吧
‎不如你告诉我珍妮弗在哪里吧？

translation.en: I really appreciate your help, thank you, but she's doing great.
translation.zh:
‎我真的很感谢你的帮助
‎谢谢你 但她很好

translation.en: -I'm gonna call the detective. -Get away from my car.
translation.zh:
‎-我这就打给探长
‎-离我的车远一点

translation.en: -You're back. -I ran into Nurse Masters while I was out.
translation.zh: ‎你回来了 ‎我在外碰见马斯特斯护士了

translation.en: She asked how you were doing.
How are we doing by the way?
translation.zh: ‎顺便问一句 我们还好吗？

translation.en: Hey, we're actually busy right now.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 我们现在其实有点忙

translation.en: It'd be great if you could come back another time.
Can you open up the gate?
There's a door in the back.
We are really starting to have some trust issues here, aren't we?
translation.zh: ‎我们之间是出现信任危机了 是吧？

translation.en: Please, tell me who you are!
The sooner you realize that, the better everything will be, I promise.
translation.zh:
‎而你越早明白这点
‎你的日子就会越好过 我答应你

translation.en: If that leg is ever gonna get better, you're gonna have to stay off it.
translation.zh:
‎如果你想要这只脚好起来的话
‎你就得停止用它

translation.en: Okay? Promise me you'll stay off it.
I promise I'll stay off of it.
Do you have any idea what I have done for you?
translation.zh: ‎你知道我为你付出了多少吗？

translation.en: We're here live with the talented and incredibly sexy--
translation.zh: ‎现场有的是才华横溢及无敌性感的…

translation.en: Excuse me... intelligent and utterly amazing.
translation.zh:
‎不好意思
‎你忘了聪明伶俐和非常了不起

translation.en: I don't know why I try anymore.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道我还在努力些什么

translation.en: was for you to love me,
and for you to know how much I love you.
translation.zh: ‎以及让你知道我有多么爱你

translation.en: I would've given up my entire world just to be a part of yours.
translation.zh:
‎我愿意放弃我的全世界
‎为的只是成为你世界的一部分

translation.en: Please. Whatever you want me to do, I'll do it.
translation.zh:
‎求求你 无论你想要我做什么
‎我都会做

translation.en: it's not up to us now, is it?
translation.zh: ‎也不是我们说了算 对吧？

translation.en: Wait. We don't have to pretend anymore. Or lie.
translation.zh:
‎等等 我们不必再假装了
‎我们不必撒谎

translation.en: I know, and it's not your fault.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 而这不是你的错

translation.en: Do you know how many years I spent working with you in that office?
translation.zh:
‎你知道我花了多少年
‎在那办公室和你一起工作吗？

translation.en: And all for the great Russell Williams to come along...
translation.zh:
‎全是为了让那伟大的
‎罗素·威廉斯出现…

translation.en: I know you better than anyone else.
I'm the one that you should be with,
I took care of anyone that could get in my way.
translation.zh: ‎我把会碍我事的人全处理掉了

translation.en: I probably would have killed you, too, but...
translation.zh: ‎我想我或许会连你也杀了 但是…

translation.en: Now, with a clean slate, I could give you the life that you always deserved.
translation.zh:
‎现在 一切重新开始
‎我能给你你所应得的生活

translation.en: We can start a new life together,
I'm really starting to feel unappreciated.
thinking about what you said before.
translation.zh: ‎仔细想过了你刚才所说的话

translation.en: I never knew you felt that way about me.
translation.zh: ‎我从不知道你对我有这种感觉

translation.en: Well, whether you know it or not,
I've always been looking out for you.
Why didn't you ever say anything?
Russell, you never gave us a chance.
translation.zh: ‎罗素 你不曾给我们彼此一个机会

translation.en: I can see how much you care about me now.
translation.zh: ‎我现在知道你是多么地在乎我了

translation.en: And I have been such a burden.
No, you haven't been a burden.
How are you? Can I get you anything?
Honey, we're all alone out here.
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 这地方就只有我们两个人

translation.en: Why did it have to be like this?
Why couldn't you just be happy?
You couldn't let us be happy, could you?
translation.zh:
‎你就是不能让我们开心地在一起
‎是吗？

translation.en: to spend the rest of my days playing golf and dating divorcees.
translation.zh:
‎花余下的日子打高尔夫球
‎和与离婚女士约会

translation.en: Going back down to San Jose?
Yeah. I just wanted to say goodbye before I left.
translation.zh: ‎对 我临走前想过来跟你道别

translation.en: I went to your old office and your boss gave me this.
translation.zh:
‎我去你的旧办公室时
‎你的上司给了我这个

translation.en: I would have brought it to the hospital,
but the nurse said you were already discharged.
translation.zh: ‎但护士说你出院了 ‎至我亲爱的珍妮弗

translation.en: Jennifer, I know it's probably silly writing you a little note like this,
translation.zh:
‎珍妮弗 我知道写这样的小纸条给你
‎或许有点蠢

translation.en: knowing we're about to spend the rest of our lives together,
translation.zh: ‎因为我们就要一起度过下半辈子了

translation.en: but I just wanted you to know that regardless of what happens next,
translation.zh:
‎但我只想让你知道
‎不管接下来发生什么事

translation.en: are the happiest memories I could ever ask for.
Not only for who you are,
but for who I am when I'm with you.
translation.zh: ‎还因为跟你在一起时 我可以是谁

translation.en: I'll love you forever and a day.
translation.zh: ‎我会爱你 比永远多一天
